name: Bounce AHead
summary:
The newest installment of the #1 bouncing series is here! 
 
Join Nick to rescue new friends as you bounce your way into the galaxy, grabbing tons of treasure, power-ups, and prizes along the way! Simple tap controls make dodging and destroying enemies a balanced amount of challenge, so there’s no better time to Bounce AHead ! 
 
AMAZING FEATURES: 
· Tap or control your character to destroy the asteroids before they turn hostile (more points for destroying careless asteroids) 
· Tap or control your character to dodge hostile asteroids (gives less point) 
· prepare for unsuspecting asteroid patterns that will pose both fun, challenges and rewards 
· progress through colorful backgrounds as your score increases 
· Play as over 15 characters — Bounce, tap, jump, fly in space with popular parody characters of pop culture, and also some of our inhouse characters from Shroom Snatchers ! 
· Compete high score in a Global and Local Leaderboard 
 
Get the latest news by joining us on social media ! 
https://www.facebook.com/Bounce-AHEad-260881801239860 
 
Support our other games here ! 
https://www.facebook.com/ShroomSnatcher 
https://twitter.com/ShroomSnatchers
